tungeon.config.schema.item module

class tungeon.config.schema.item.Item(json_data: dict)[source]

Bases: NamedJSONRepresentation

representation of an item that is defined in config files

property damage: int | None

damage the item provides, only relevant for weapons

property functions: list[Functionality]
property is_armor: bool

Flag whether the item is an armor or not, defaults to False

property is_melee: bool

Flag whether item is used in melee or not, defaults to False Main usage is for weapons

property is_ranged: bool

Flag whether item is used in ranged or not, defaults to False Main usage is for weapons

property is_shield: bool

Flag whether the item is a shield or not, defaults to False

property is_weapon: bool

Flag whether item is a weapon or not, defaults to False

property money_value: int | None

prize for the item to pay under normal conditions can be None, eg on unique items that you would not be able to sell or buy

property required_hands: int | None

hands required to use an item relevant for weapons only, determines whether user has a free hand for a shield

property resistance: int | None

resistance an item provides, mostly relevant for shield and armor

Bases: JSONRepresentation

Representation of a JSON object that comes with a name and display-name attribute

property display_name: str | None

name to be displayed to users

property name: str | None

name of element used in other places to reference this object
